title: Question 9
prompt:
Sentence Z: If you have a problem with your office environment or job duties, work with your employer to try to find a solution.

Which of the following is the best place to add sentence Z to this text?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
Sentence Z presents a situation in which you might not resign. It suggests that problems might be worked out with your current employer. “If you have a problem with your office environment or job duties, work with your employer to try to find a solution.” The text talks about working with your employer to improve your work environment in paragraph A. It provides a similar example in sentence 4. Adding sentence Z after sentence 3 gives two examples of situations in which you might carefully consider your decision to resign.


(1) Regardless of your reasons for leaving a job, you will do so in a professional manner. (2) Leaving a job can have long-term positive or negative affects on your career. (3) Before resigning, carefully consider your decision. (Z) If you have a problem with your office environment or job duties, work with your employer to try to find a solution.(4) Be sure to discuss your situation with your employer if your main goal is a higher salary. (5) You may be able to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
